EmailTemplate.description: The second round of invitations that goes out to the invitation list after 2 weeks. Garrett Zaino, 3/21/2012
EmailTemplate.name: NY - Networking - May 17 2012.Invite2
EmailTemplate.subject: 2 Weeks Left - MBO Partners' Spring 2012 Networking Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Spring 2012 Networking Reception: Zengo May 17, 2012 Don't forget to register for our Spring Networking Reception! Please join the MBO team, Associates, as well as representatives from many of our prestigious clients, for a night of networking and fun at local hot spot Zengo in Manhattan, 5:30pm-8:30pm, at 622 Third Avenue at 40th Street.
MBO invites you to this Networking Reception to learn about some of our exciting new initiatives, meet and mingle with fellow Associates, Clients, and MBO team managers, all while enjoying tasty cocktails, and luscious hors d'oeuvres on us! Consider this a token of our appreciation for being part of our MBO family.
This is a party you do not want to miss, so hurry and register today, as space is limited - we all know how popular this reception is!
Register now <http://info.mbopartners.com/NYNetworkingMay172012_Spring-2012-Registration.html>
We look forward to seeing you!
Sincerely,
MBO Partners
Suggested dress code is business to business casual. Don't forget to bring your business cards! Questions? Please contact Marcelle Saab, Associate Relations Manager, 703-793-6006 MBO Partners 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive Suite 300 Herndon, VA 20171
Contact Us <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
